casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

January 24, 2014

[Cite as 01/24/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-220.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-1552. Plassman v. Ohio Adult Parole Auth.

In Habeas Corpus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of habeas corpus.

Upon consideration of petitioner’s motion for appointment of counsel, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
